articles.author: Community Bulletin
articles.title: Woman waking dog struck by pickup truck in Lambertville, police say
articles.description: Police said a 76-year-old city woman walking her dog was injured when she was struck by a pickup truck while crossing Main Street on Jan. 10, 2018, police said.
